OnAfterSave() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; LÃ–SCHEN INVENTUR DATEI ; ; Called By : Form INWEINVK : Execute After Save ; ; ; ByRef : VORG(1) Stocktake to be deleted ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 15-Dec-2009 GRF SR17084: preserve user language within background job; ; use specific tag; cleanup ; 22-Nov-2007 shobby SRAdHoc: Allowing deleting of non-numeric ; 07-Aug-2006 FAN SR14857: Stocktake Batch/Update changes ; 03-May-2006 PP&JW SR14508: Check for postings, delete properly. ; 06.06.2000 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idLog,idStocktake
set idStocktake = VORG(1)
if $$IsStocktakePosted(idStocktake) { do ^WWWINFO($$$Text("IN00457")) ; "Cannot delete a posted Stocktake"
} else { ; Generating Stocktake do StartLog^COMLog($$^WWWFORMNAME(YFORM)_": "_idStocktake_" ("_$$$INWEINVPRemark($get(^INWEINVP(YM,idStocktake,1)))_")",.idLog)
; JOB START(YM,idStocktake,idLog) //::1 ;SR14508 job START(YM,idStocktake,idLog,$get(SPRACHE)) ; SR17084

Success or fail ; reported in the log ; 26-Oct-2007, PJones Kill the counts for this stocktake ; 25-Oct-2007, PJones BR014730, remove lock from sites when deleting stocktake ; 11-May-2006 JW SR14508: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do ^WWWVAR new strLocations,objStocktake,strStatus
if penumLang'="" set (SPRACHE,LANGUAGE) = penumLang ; SR17084
set YM = pidCompany set objStocktake = $get(^INWEINVP(YM,pidStocktake,1))
if pidLog'="" do AddMessage^COMLog(pidLog,$$^WWWTEXT(33892)) ; "Processing"
set strStatus = $$$Kill("INWEINVP",pidStocktake) ; SR17084
if pidLog'="" { if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { ; remove lock from sites when deleting stocktake set strLocations = $$$INWEINVPSiteLocation(objStocktake) do UnlockSiteLocationList^INLocking(strLocations,$$$EnumINLOCKTYPEStocktake,pidStocktake) do AddMessage^COMLog(pidLog,$$^WWWTEXT(32051)) ; "Deleted"
} else { do AddMessage^COMLog(pidLog,strStatus) } } quit
IsStocktakePosted(pidStocktake) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Checks if any Stocktake lines ahve been posted ; ; Inputs : ; ; Returns : ; ; History : ; 15-Dec-2009 GRF Order macro ; 28-Feb-2006 PP&JW SR14508: Check if Stocktake is posted ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnPosted,intCnt
set blnPosted = $$$NO
set intCnt = "" for { set intCnt = $order(^INWEINV(0,pidStocktake,intCnt)) quit:intCnt=""
if $$$INWEINVPosted($get(^INWEINV(0,pidStocktake,intCnt,1)))'="" { set blnPosted = $$$YES quit } }
quit blnPosted
